# Q001 Capital of France
^question Q001
^type multiple_choice_single
^identifier MC_Q001
^title Capital of France
^points 1
^labels #Geography #Europe #Remember #Easy

@field: question_text
What is the capital of France?
@end_field

@field: options
^Shuffle Yes
A. London
B. Paris
C. Berlin
D. Madrid
@end_field

@field: answer
B
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
Paris has been the capital of France since the late 10th century.
@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback
Correct! Paris is the capital of France.
@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback
Incorrect. The capital of France is Paris.
@@end_field

@@field: unanswered_feedback
Please select an answer.
@@end_field

@end_field
